title: Coronavirus Enters New Phase, Can’t Fight the Virus Without Harming the Economy, Boeing Draws Down Loan
itunes:title: Coronavirus Enters New Phase, Can’t Fight the Virus Without Harming the Economy, Boeing Draws Down Loan
description:
Bloomberg News U.S. Heath Care Team Leader Drew Armstrong explains that the coronavirus is entering a new phase as containment efforts have faltered. Bloomberg News White House Reporter Justin Sink describes how President Trump was shaken into taking action on the coronavirus outbreak. Bloomberg Businessweek Economics Editor Peter Coy discusses that the all-out effort to battle the coronavirus is doing more harm to global growth than the disease itself. Bloomberg News Leveraged Finance Reporter Paula Seligson talks about Boeing's plan to draw down the full amount of a $13.8 billion loan amid worldwide travel disruptions from the coronavirus. And we Drive to the Close with Melda Mergen, Deputy Global Head of Equities at Columbia Threadneedle Investments.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
